Description.Name: Partisan Heavy Tank
Description.Details: Mounting a pair each of Rotary AC/5s and LB 2-X ACs, the 3067 RAC variant of the Partisan is able to pump out a significant amount of gunfire in a short amount of time. It also adds another ton of armor for increase durability. This 3069 variant also uses an XL engine, but mounts four Rotary AC/2s, a Targeting Computer, and a C3 slave unit to trade targeting data. The armor protection has been increased by nearly 45% over the base XL variant. Kallon Industries, famous for designing some of the most popular anti-aircraft 'Mechs in the Inner Sphere, designed the Partisan to bring those same capabilities onto a cheaper, more easily produced vehicle. Dedicated to destroying aircraft, its targeting system can track up to 200 targets at once, compute the optimal target, and link to the targeting systems of other Partisans in the unit. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 3/5 Hex: 90/150 Meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 200 40 Left 160 40 Right 160 40 Rear 130 40 Turret 200 40 Total 850 200 Quirk: Anti-Air Targeting

YangsThoughts: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
